news.title: Scaling Laws Still Intact: New Research Findings
news.summary: Recent compute-optimal scaling analysis confirms that we are still far from hitting data ceilings for large model pre-training.

news.title: Open-Source Agents Outperform Proprietary Baselines
news.summary: A breakthrough in small model reasoning allows 7B parameters agents to handle complex multi-step workflows previously reserved for GPT-4.

projects.name: Local News Curator

chineseWritings.title: Philosophy of the Machine
